links.to_node: tell the cops what I really saw and contradict my girlfriend
My girlfriend may feel betrayed and hurt by my decision to contradict her account of the incident
There may be tension and conflict between us and my girlfriend due to the contradiction in our statements to the police
The police may become suspicious of the conflicting statements and may investigate further to determine the truth
The other driver may deny making any derogatory remarks, leading to a he-said-she-said situation
The relationship between me and my girlfriend may be strained as a result of the differing statements given to the police
